messages.title: ELECTION FOCUS May 2017
messages.content:
General Election â€“ Thursday June 8th

Vote for the Liberal Democrats is a positive vote for:

- staying in the single market to protect our jobs and health and social care

- investment in the NHS, our physical health, mental health and social care

The Liberal Democrats are the only logical continuation in this constituency - the best-placed party to defeat the Conservatives here in the General Election

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Building local, on brownfield sites, moving away from the 'one of the most attractive parts of the country,' and providing more affordable housing.
Creating jobs locally but 'in the context of' previously developed countryside.
Improving local rail links to central London and the Thames Valley.
Opposition to hard Brexit and supporting a referendum on the final Brexit deal.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Liberal Democrats are presented as the best-placed party to defeat the Conservatives in the constituency.

issues.brexitEurope: Opposing hard Brexit and supporting a referendum on the final deal. Standing up for the rights of UK and EU citizens living in Europe and the United Kingdom.
issues.environment: Protecting green spaces and environmental standards, as well as tackling climate change and ensuring animal protections.
issues.health: Investing in NHS and social care.
issues.immigration: Standing up for the rights of UK and EU citizens living in Europe and the United Kingdom.

housing.content: Building local, on brownfield sites, moving away from the 'one of the most attractive parts of the country,' and providing more affordable housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: Passionate about Chess Valley and fighting to prevent over development on the Green Belt.

politicalExperience.role: Company director in the print industry
politicalExperience.achievements: Active in local charities, environmental issues, and engagement with local politics

endorsements.endorser: Ruth Juett, who won her seat on the local council against the Conservatives
endorsements.endorsement: Visible and referenced in an image within the leaflet.

quotes.text: The Liberal Democrats are the only logical continuation in this constituency - the best-placed party to defeat the Conservatives here in the General Election.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet references both an upcoming general election and the results of a recent county council election.
